int(* arrow_btsp_fun::feasible)(struct arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem, int min_cost, int max_cost, double tour_length, int *tour)

Determines if the given tour is feasible or not.

Parameters:
fun [in] function structure
problem [in] the problem to check against
min_cost [in] min_cost to consider for active edges
max_cost [in] max_cost to consider for active edges
tour_length [in] the length of the given tour
tour [in] the tour in node-node format
Returns:
ARROW_TRUE if the tour is feasible, ARROW_FALSE if not
